mapper.update: UPDATE sys_resource t SET t.rgt=(t.rgt + #{amount}), t.update_time=now() WHERE 1=1 AND t.is_update =1 AND id = #{id}

UPDATE sys_resource t SET t.lft=(t.lft + #{amount}), t.rgt=(t.rgt + #{amount}), t.update_time=now()
,t.level=(t.level + #{level})
WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.id in
#{id}

UPDATE sys_resource t SET t.status= #{status}, t.update_time=now() WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.id in
#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(t.uri, "==", UPPER(t.method)) AS url, GROUP_CONCAT(role.code ORDER BY t.uri) AS needRoles FROM sys_resource t INNER JOIN sys_role_resource rr ON t.id = rr.resource_id INNER JOIN sys_role role ON rr.role_id = role.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND t.status = 1 AND t.`type` = 2 GROUP BY t.uri, t.id ORDER BY url DESC
